Articles.Content:
I posted it before on reddit before I realized that was dumb. SO, here it is, my first post and one of my longest works. The USS Pheonix from Star Trek First Contact.

Edit: I won't post the craft file because it contains HEAVILY modified configs, and has a huge propensity to kill your game.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/xwu5PGfb5ns?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-12T21:22:41Z" title="06/12/2015 09:22  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 12, 2015</time> by Twitchy115**
